title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 141-2.7 - Employer residing on building premises
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 141-2.7 - Employer residing on building premises

State Regulations

Where the employer resides in the building or within a
distance of 200 feet therefrom and where the employer participates
substantially in the maintenance, care or operation of the building, such
employer may consider an employee in such building to be an "all other"
worker. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
141-2.7

Amended

New

York State Register December 28, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 52, eff. 12/31/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
